title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Mar 11 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Mar 11 2022
description:
Florida Surgeon General Dr. Joseph Ladapo joins Clay and Buck to explain why he's advising parents not to give the covid shot to children, and why he won't allow his kids to get it. The Twitter-banned Alex Berenson interview: Alarming UK data -- covid infections rising, 90% of dead are vaccinated, China's covid-zero policy, mask mandate on planes, airports extended, Alex vs. his mom on covid panic, where's Fauci? C&B 24/7 Mailbag Friday: Clay and Buck answer emails from 24/7 VIPs.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
